Life-risking group effort saves 8-year-old boy trapped under waterfall, Central Otago https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/life-risking-group-effort-saves-8-year-old-boy-trapped-under-waterfall-central-otago/5CGWB2GWRJHAVGOJHHBI36CYMY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/life-risking-group-effort-saves-8-year-old-boy-trapped-under-waterfall-central-otago/5CGWB2GWRJHAVGOJHHBI36CYMY/ Ben TomsettIt took around 20 people to save 8-year-old Mackie Blaikie's life. Summer humidity, heat set to rise: Where temperatures could hit mid-30s this week https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/summer-scorcher-where-temporals-could-hit-mid-30s-this-week/AU67AWP25NGP3ENZXYH5Z2R2MM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/summer-scorcher-where-temporals-could-hit-mid-30s-this-week/AU67AWP25NGP3ENZXYH5Z2R2MM/ Jamie MortonTemperatures could reach mid-30s in parts of NZ later this week, with humidity in the mix. Workplace culture highlighted in report into suicide of Nelson addiction services clinician Andrew Walker https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/workplace-culture-highlighted-in-report-into-suicide-of-nelson-addiction-services-clinician-andrew-walker/46Z7OKDGE5EPLDMSHHFVAIXBHQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/workplace-culture-highlighted-in-report-into-suicide-of-nelson-addiction-services-clinician-andrew-walker/46Z7OKDGE5EPLDMSHHFVAIXBHQ/ Tracy NealWorkSafe found 'very poor workplace culture' at DHB after clinician's suicide. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 04:51:46 +0000 A youth clinician who took his own life had complained of being increasingly distressed at work. His death triggered an investigation into the workplace culture within Nelson-Marlborough DHB's addiction services. Photo / 123rf

Great white shark circles boatie off Hen and Chickens Islands, Northland for over an hour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/great-white-shark-circles-boatie-off-hen-and-chickens-islands-northland-for-over-an-hour/TKEIPF6OS5EOFGTURI6RSYAWQY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/great-white-shark-circles-boatie-off-hen-and-chickens-islands-northland-for-over-an-hour/TKEIPF6OS5EOFGTURI6RSYAWQY/ Raphael FranksA shark expert says it appears the shark had been caught in a net and injured. Video / Warwick Catchpole
